Both of you stop outside your room. "This is my room, my roommate hasn't arrived yet. There were noises coming from the other room on this floor though. Maybe we could knock on?" You say smiling.

Leah ignores the last part and sticks her head through your door and looks around. "This is your room huh, cute decorating"

"Er thanks. So should we knock on the other room?" you say.

"Nah, best not if the roomies are just getting to know each other." she pulls her head out of your room. "Lets try down stairs check out, the lounge and kitchen. You lead the way" Leah extends her arm indicating you should go first. You oblige and head to the group floor. As you are walking you look over your shoulder and you see Leah again watching your ass and legs but you don't say anything.

As you reach the ground floor you head through hall to the lounge.

"Wonder whats the chance of finding someone in here" Leah says flippantly.
14512.title: Leah

choices: Boisterous, out of the closet tomboy.
145122.content:
Just as you are about enter the lounge, you hear the faint murmur of voices. With your hopes raised you round the corner with Leah still in tow and enter the room. The lounge is quite large with a flat screen TV on the wall a couple of tables with two couches and chairs. In the couches are sat 5 girls who have now stopped talking and are all staring at you.

You stop in the doorway, intimidated by the silence you have caused. You shyly look around all the girl's faces thinking about how to introduce yourself but before you can speak, Leah pushes you further into the room and enters herself.

"Hey guys" she says energetically, "Where have you all been I thought it was a ghost house."

Thankfully this distraction moves everyone's eyes off you.

A girl lounging on the coach with a short pixie cut and wearing check shirt and baggy jeans "We all had a walk to check out part of the campus, we only got back a few minutes ago. Im Hannah by the way."

"Im Leah and this lil lady is Mel" she says pointing to you.

"Hi" you say quietly.

"Sit down, we are just getting to know each other but if its only you two that means there's another girl yet to arrive."

"Yeah thats my roommate" you say sitting on an empty couch with Leah.

"Who is in the room at top?" Leah asks looking around.

"That would be me, I'm Molly". You follow the voice to see that it belongs to an Asian girl lounging on a chair to your left wearing a black top and floral skirt. She notices your glance and grins at you before turning her gaze back to Leah.
http://cdn9.lbstatic.nu/files/looks/larg...

"Nice, I think we should get on" Leah says smiling.

"I think we will" she says returning the smile.

Over the next hour you get to know your other housemates. You learn that Hannah is from Chicago, Leah is from San Francisco and Molly is from New York. The other three girls are called Sarah, Emma and Becky. While they seem like nice enough people, they sort of blend into the furniture in the conversations but maybe they will grow more as the year goes on. What surprises you however is that while you talk, all the girls seem to ask you the most questions and when you talk they almost always all go silent and look to you just like when you first walked in.

"So where are you from then Mel?" Molly says after you talked about course modules.

"I just live around 70 miles away In a small town. Its nice but not at all busy." you say happily since you are now used to your company a little more.

As you say this the whole room takes in a sharp intake off breathe.

"What?" you say confused.

"Well..." Hannah starts. "Well it just can't have been easy for you. Everyone knows people in small towns tend to be less... accepting than most others." You look around the room and see looks of sympathy and concern on all faces.

"What do you mean?" you say, even more confused.

Hannah opens her mouth to answer but before she can speak, the front door of the house is flung open.

"That must be your roommate Mel." Leah says with a smirk. At that, all in the room rise and head quickly for the hall.

You stand and follow the crowd to find bags stacked in the hall and the door still open. The group of you head outside. You wonder what your roommate will be like. While you are getting on with your other housemates especially with Leah, Molly and Hannah (despite their odd natures), roommates should have a closer bond.

"I hope she's nice" you think.
145122.title: People are in there

1451222.content:
How about...

A girl in the closet.

or

Another "Straight" girl
1451222.title: Someone else

14512221.content:
The group of you pile outside and look up the house's drive. Standing in the middle of the drive is a tall (around 6 ft 2), blonde girl wearing a white top crop jeans and flats. She watches you all come out, looking a little amused. Her eyes roam from person to person, stopping on you and a mischievous smile spreads across her face. http://cdn9.lbstatic.nu/files/looks/larg...

"This is a nice welcome. I might make an effort to be late in the future if this is what it gets me. Im Ella by the way. So, which one of you is my roommate?" She says folding her arms.

"Thats me, you can call me Mel" you say brightly.

Ella smile grows even bigger as though she finds something funny. "I guess they assigned us our rooms for space optimization then" she says fighting back laughter.

Some of the group laugh at this and you yourself smile a little, knowing at some point your short height would be the subject of jokes.

"Anyway, would you mind showing me our room then so I can drop off my bags?"

Everyone mumbles the affirmative and renters the house and heads back into the lounge while you wait by Ella's bags. She walks in, closing the door behind her and picks up her bags.

"So where we headin' roomie?"

"We're just up stairs, follow me." you start up the stairs and Ella follows. You look to see her struggling slightly with the weight of her bags. "Would you like some help." you offer, knowing you wouldn't be much use.

"Nah its fine, these bags are probably each heavier than you anyway." She says.

You can tell your size difference is going to be running joke for your time together but you don't mind much since you are perfectly happy being small and cute.

"Here we are" you say as you reach your room. You both walk in and Ella drops her bags in the unoccupied half. She looks around and whistles.

"This is nice, much nicer than my room at home. I like your decor choice", without warning she opens your wardrobe "And your clothes are all so pretty too." she turns back to you grinning again. "Shame we won't be able to borrow outfits eh?"

You chuckle at this. "Come on, its been less than than ten minutes and we've already had three height jokes, you should pace yourself, we are living together for a year remember."

"Don't worry about it, I got plenty." You both smile at each other, looking each other in the eye. You've struck lucky with your roommate and know you two are going to get on really well. After a few seconds, the knowing stare and silence becomes awkward and you look down blushing slightly. "Do you mind introducing me to the others Mel? I don't really fancy unpacking yet."

"Sure, they should just be in the lounge downstairs." You lead the way again downstairs and into the lounge. Everyone is sat chatting again looking through what looks like a welcome package. Leah looks up as you and Ella walk in.

"Ah, your back, I hope the house elf has showed you where everything is." Everyone bursts out laughing at this.

"Looks like the corks out the bottle" you think. "Hey come on, just cos Ella made a joke about my height doesn't mean the rest of you should run with it." You put on a pout, acting offended.

"Okay okay, i'll be good" Leah says still laughing.

You sit on an unoccupied couch and Ella slumps down next to you. The next few minutes are spent with everyone introducing themselves to Ella.

"So what are you all looking at?" Ella asks after the introductions have been made, gesturing to the arrival booklet.

Hannah answers. "Its just a list of events happening this week. Since lectures don't start till next week, this week they are calling Welcome Week and have filled with loads of cool stuff."

"NO WAY!" Leah exclaims still reading the booklet. "It says in here that legal drinking age is 18 and that there are 4 nightclubs on campus that all serve booze to students, not to mention the restaurants and bars too."

"Your joking" Hannah says shocked and everyone gathers around Leah to make sure that the booklet does indeed say that.

"Does it say why?" Hannah asks.

"Apparently the university governors are confident that those they have admitted are responsible enough to drink and that they have a special deal with the state that as long as we drink on campus, its all good and legal." Leah replies.

"Thats probably why we are walled in" Mollys says.

"Hey! There's an event tonight at one of the nightclubs called Kitties. Doors open at 10." Leah looks up from reading and then to each of you with a pleading look on her face. "We are going aren't we?"

"Im in" Molly and Hannah say in unison.

"Sure who needs to unpack." Laughs Ella.

Sarah, Emily and Becky all murmur their agreement, leaving just you.

"So how about it Mel?" Leah asks looking at you now.
14512221.title: Closet girl

145122211.content:
"Sure I'm going, there's no way I'd miss it."

"Great!" Leah exclaims, "Our first night out as a house." She turns to Molly. "Hey we better start getting ready its 8 now, do you want to shower first or me?" She stands heading for the door

"You can go first" Molly says also rising from her chair.

"Nice, see you guys later" Molly and Leah exit the lounge.

"Yeah I suppose I better get started too." Hannah says also leaving.

Sarah, Rebecca and Emma also express their need to get ready and then excuse themselves leaving you and Ella.

"So do you want to shower first or should I?" you ask.

"You can go first Mel, I have to unpack some things first" She stands and you follow.

You both head upstairs and into your rooms and Ella immediately puts one of her bags on her bed and begins rummaging.

You open your wardrobe to select what you with be wearing. You settle on a low cut red mini dress and a black corset top to go underneath. You also grab a fresh pair of panties. "I'm going for my shower now" you say.

"Alright see you in a bit" Ella says without looking up from her unpacking and you enter the en-suite and close the door behind you. You start by stripping out of your clothes, making sure to carefully fold them and hang them on a rack. You then step into the show and sigh almost erotically as you turn on the stream and warm water begins cascading over your delicate body. After applying shower gel, moisturizer, shampoo and conditioner, you reluctantly turn off the water and quickly wrap yourself in a soft and fluffy towel. You then dry your hair and style it before starting to get dressed. The new pair of black silky panties come first, closely followed by your corset top that acts as a bra. You decide to put your sheer pantyhose back on, rolling them up your legs and then put on the dress which hugs your cute butt perfectly. Your black stilettos you were wearing earlier complete the look leaving you only to do your makeup.

Thinking you have spent too much time in the bathroom, you opt to put on your makeup at your vanity to give Ella a chance.

"Your turn Ella" you say, exiting the bathroom.

A blur rushes past you and into the bathroom. "Thanks" comes Ella's voice and then the door closes.

"Your welcome" you say to yourself and then slump into your vanity chair to start with the makeup. After applying some foundation, you add some light eye-shadow and eye-liner and finally finishing with some red lipstick. You do a couple of touch ups and then check the time. 9:30 the clock says.

"Crap, don't want to be late" you say and then run to your wardrobe and pull out a short leather jacket to go over your dress which you wrap around your shoulders. "Cute" you say looking the mirror. Bored and with nothing else to do you strike some poses in the mirror and then suddenly comes a flash of light which rouses you from your day dreaming.

"Gotcha" Ella says holding a camera triumphantly. She is stood in the door way of the bathroom fully dressed in a long tunic with black leggings and 3 inch heels adding to her already substantial height.

"Hey!" you say startled "Give that here". You mince over to her in your heels but she merely holds the camera in the air and out of your reach.
After a couple of futile attempts to grab it you pout and sit on your bed, mock-sulking.

"Alright I'll show it you." Ella says and sits next to you on the bed. "See, I don't see what the big deal was, you look cute." You look at the digital screen and have to agree with her. http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-eL1VV4EcFII/Vi...
"Your right but next time can you give a bit more warning before you take photos."

"Where would the fun in that be" Ella says impishly, "Besides, the best photos are natural and you can really get natural if you don't know its coming."

"Fine" you say exasperated. "I'm going to see if Leah and Molly are ready, you coming?"

"I'll be ready in a sec, just need to put on a little makeup.

You leave Ella to her makeup and head upstairs in search of Leah and Molly. It doesn't take long however as just like earlier in the day you find Leah hanging around in the middle of the stairs. You are taken back at how good she looks. She is wearing long luxurious fur like faux-fur coat over a fluffy black mini-skirt and a beige camisole. On her feet are glittery Mary Jane heels. http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-uoHpkoWEYIw/VG...

You feel something stir inside you again you have never felt before today.

"Wow Leah, you look great. That coat is beautiful."

"Of hey Mel" she says noticing you. "Thanks, but enough about me sweetie, you look hot, your going to turn heads tonight."

You blush at the compliment. "Thanks you, so are you ready? Where's Molly?"

"Im ready but Molly said she would catch up to us at the club. Want to head down?"

"Sure." You go back down the stairs and find your room empty so you both decide to check the lounge. As you walk, you again notice that Leah is checking out your legs and butt but far less discretely this time. You are unsure about how you feel about this but that doesn't stop you from swaying your hips and tush more as you go. Upon entering the lounge you find everyone in there but Molly.

"There they are" Hannah says jumping from her seat. She is wearing a smart blazer and shirt with dark jeans. "And looking good too. I'm assuming we are all ready."

Leah quickly explains the plan with Molly before you all set out to leave.

"So er does anyone know where the place is?" you ask as you step through the front door into the driveway.

"Don't worry, its not far." Ella says coming up beside you. "and if your little legs get tired I'll carry you." she laughs.

"Hey, how come you get to carry her?" Leah says in mock protest.

Hannah turns around too. "Yeah, some of us wouldn't mind helping a damsel in distress." She winks at you.

"Its a roommate's privilege" Ella says.

"Don't I get a say in this" you ask, slightly confused at whats going on. "My legs are fine."

"Indeed they are" Leah says looking you up and down again.

You sigh and resign yourself to an odd walk to the club filled with awkward banter.
145122211.title: Getting ready

1451222111.content:
The walk to the club is actually quite pleasant. It isn't too far and the campus itself is beautiful. You pass house after house, all nicely maintained and also see the entrance to the park and the swimming lake. Other groups of girls emerge from houses or are walking in the same direction as you, all chatting and laughing loudly. Much to the disappointment of Leah and Hannah, your "little legs" make it to the destination.

On the edge of the residential area, the surroundings start to look like a small town, with a few high-streets and nestled on one of the corners is the neon sign most clubs possess, this one reading "Kitties". There is a rather large que of people waiting for entry down a dimly lit stairwell. To your great surprise, you see no guys in the line, surely the first night of college is something all guys should be into, especially since drinking is legal.

"Here we are I guess." Hannah says taking a place in the line. "The lines big but that means it should be packed inside, besides, its moving quiet fast."

"No rush." Leah says absent-mindedly. You follow her gaze and see that her eyes transfixed on a groups of giggling blondes just a few spaces behind you in the line.

"What do ya think eh?" Ella nudges you. "Excited?"

You look up at her. "Yeah of course" you admit "but I just wonder where all the guys are."

At this all in your group whirl round to face you. Even Leah breaks her stare on the blondes. They all look shocked.

"What did I say?" you ask.

"Mel you do realize that this is an all-female college?" Hannah asks looking concerned.

Now its your turn to look shocked.

"Yeah their ain't any males with 20 miles of this place. Even all the staff are female ." Ella adds.

"How didn't you know?" Leah asks now.

"I.. I guess I just chose the best college offer I received. Sappho academy said I would be a perfect addition so I took it."

"Didn't you go to the induction tours they offered?"

"No there was never time. My mom and dad are always working plus there are my younger sisters to think of."

"That would explain it." Hannah says looking less alarmed.

"One last question" Leah says "You weren't coming to college expecting to get a boyfriend were you?" She looks at you with a raised eyebrow.

"Course not" you say quickly, trying not to look stupid in front of your friends.

Leah immediately perks up again. "Well thats fine then, we wouldn't want someone going to the wrong university by mistake." She then turns her focus back on the blondes who were now hugging each other.

As Hannah said, the line moved quickly and after about ten minutes of chatting, you are at the entrance. The bouncers on the door and both female but are huge and muscly women who could probably beat up most men. They each check everyone's ids, with your bouncer examining your id longer than everyone else's before handing it back to you and giving you a gruff. "Stay safe sweet heart" and letting you follow the others down the stairs into the club.
1451222111.title: At the club

14512221111.content:
The deep bass of the club music reverberates in the stairwell before Hannah in front of everyone opens the door to the floor and dance music fills your ears. As you reach the bottom of the stair, through the door you see an expansive world of flashing lights and people. Ella gives you a nudge and together as a group you enter in and walk to what appears to be the bar. As you walk you see multiple floors, booths and entrances into other rooms which also seem to be shimmering with light. All the people present in the club are girls around your age, maybe a little older and the number must be in the mid thousands and yet thanks to the huge room, there is still plenty of space. Its like you are in a world where men don't exist and you are in awe at the scale of the place and eager to get dancing.

As you reach the bar, Hannah says she will buy the first lot of drinks and calls over a barkeep. After a yelled conversation over the music, the barkeep sets to work on the order. She herself grabs a bottle of beer, passes vodka cokes to Sarah, Emma, Rebecca, a whisky and coke to Ella, an alcopop to Leah before handing you a bright pink drink in a cocktail class, decorated with a fluffy straw. She winks at you as she gives it you. You accept it as its too loud for you to ask why you got it and take a sip. It tastes like every sweet berry mixed together and you eagerly take another sip. There is no residual bitterness or a kick to it but you can tell it is alcoholic. Hannah then leads the group to a quiet booth to drink and talk as the club fills. You sit between Ella and Leah and thanks to the quieter environment, you are able to talk with the group. Because of the deliciousness of your drink, you are the first to finish, slightly upset as you take your last sip from your straw. It doesn't take long before the strength of your drink becomes apparent and you start slurring your words slightly and having never had touched alcohol before, you don't know what to expect. All the others in the groups look at each other with knowing smiles however as you try to talk. Eventually, everyone else finishes their drinks and you all head to the bar again before heading to dance. When you stand you are little unsteady in your heels but your balance soon comes back. Everyone receives the same drink but with Leah paying and then you all move on to one of the many dance floors.

When finding a space in the crowd, you all start to dance together. You continue like this for while, dancing with your drinks until Hannah, with Emma, Rebecca and Sarah move off and join what looks to be triplets, all dressed the same, dancing together. You, Ella and Leah remain dancing but you aren't really paying attention to your surroundings. Having finished your second cocktail, you are quite drunk but still enjoying yourself. After a bit longer, Leah moves off too, saying she is going to look for Molly as she has texted saying she has arrived which leaves just you and Ella. You two aren't dancing long however before you fall on the floor and being unable to get up yourself, have to be lifted up by Ella.

"Looks like someone can't handle their booze. Better get you home." She says into your ear which causes you to giggle stupidly. She helps you off the floor and to the exit. She practically carries you up the stairs and as you reach the bouncer's post, they look at you with amusement. "Don't worry about her, the lil lady has just had a little too much to drink." Ella says to them as you pass and before proceeding on the way home.
14512221111.title: In the club

145122211111.content:
The walk home does you good and while you aren't nearly sober as you get there, you are in control enough to walk largely unaided.

"Well how was that for your first night out Mel?" Ella asks unlocking the front door.

"It wwas great, that drink was amazink." You say.

"I think you enjoyed it a bit too much now lets get you upstairs."

After entering and closing the door. Ella and yourself head upstairs with her behind you, making sure don't fall back. When at the top Ella opens your room, turns on the light and you follow her in. On entering you immediately take off your jacket and kick off your heels, sending them hurtling across the room with one landing on your bed and the other going into the bathroom.

"Hey careful Mel." Ella says sitting on the edge of her bed in the process of removing her own heeled boots. "I know you wanna get them off but calm down, my feet hurt too you know."

You then proceed to lie down on the floor face up, right next to Ella's bed. "I'm not tired" you say stubbornly.

"Thats great" Ella says reassuringly. As she removes her last boot. "How about you do something useful until you are sleepy and give me a footrub, my feet are killing." She says this with some uncertainty in her voice but you don't notice it and having been doing ballet all your life, you have given your share of foot massages.

"Sure" you say rising to your knees and crawling in front of Ella as she sits on the bed.

"Really are you sure?" Ella says in disbelief.

"Yeah I'll do it" you say with a slight hic. You grab one of Ella's feet and begin rubbing it to help reduce the muscle pain. Straight away Ella reacts.

"Oh thats great Mel, keep going." she moans.

You oblige, rubbing and pressing, sliding your fingers between her toes to massage in-between. You vary from light to hard caresses over all of her foot before swapping and moving to the other foot and repeating.

Ella lets out another erotic moan but you don't notice, too drunk and too absorbed by your work. Its only when you look up to ask her how it feels that you notice her panting on the edge of the bed.

"Erm yeah, Mel it feels really good, please keep going." She says dismissively and you go back to work. After five more minutes of rubbing you are about to stop and pass out on your bed but Ella speaks up. "Erm Mel. My right foot still hurts a little, can you kiss it better?"

Still too drunk to see the absurdity of the request you lean in casing your hair to fall over your face and plant a light peck on the top of her foot.

"It still hurts Mel" Ella says "Can you please do it again? Maybe like a bit harder, like a romantic one?"

Again you go in but this time you picture the foot as a pair of lips and smooch it playfully for a good thirty seconds before rising again and seeing lipstick marks on her foot. "Does your foot feel better now?" you ask looking up at Ella who is now very flushed.

"Yesthatsgreat" Ella gasps quickly.

"Okay" you, struggling to your feet and then slumping on your bed letting your eyes close. "Your my beshtest friend you know that?" and those are your last words of the night before passing out.

Do you remember the events of the night in the morning?
145122211111.title: Booze and Footrubs

1451222111112.content:
Your eyes flutter open revealing your room bathed in early afternoon sunlight. You smile slightly but stop when you taste the bitterness and dryness in your mouth which causes you to gag. You rise and discover you are still wearing your dress and pantyhose from the night before but someone has covered you with your bed sheets so you would be warm. Grabbing the glass of water on your desk table that someone has left you, you greedily guzzle until it is empty and put the glass down panting. The clock on the bedside table reads 13:42, "Better get moving" you sigh and swing yourself out of bed to your feet. To your surprise, aside from the cotton mouth, you don't seem to be suffering from a hangover at all however you can't recall any events after entering the club. You look over to Ella's bed to find that it is empty and has been made. Wanting to find someone, you give your hair a quick brush to get rid of the bed head and then head out of your room and downstairs still in the dress and barefoot in pantyhose.

The house is deathly quiet save for a faint moaning sound coming from Hannah's room you think nothing of. Upon entering the living room, you immediately see Leah, slumped on a couch dressed in a black top and long black shawl which she has drawn up over herself, grey short shorts with sheer black tights underneath and toeless black oxfords on her feet. Her face is done up with dark makeup and she is wearing dark sun glasses so you can't see if she is awake or not.

"Hey how are you?" You ask brightly.

"How? How is this possible." Leah's immobile form comes to life. "How is it that you get stone drunk and are fresh as a daisy in the morning while I have to suffer in this world of regret and pain which I now reside. Oww!" She clutches her head and draws up her shawl more. Clearly she is worse for wear.

"I wouldn't say she was that fresh Leah" comes Ella's voice from the kitchen doorway and you turn to see her grinning in her usual manner. She is wearing a pair of dark cuffed jeans, a oversized and sleeveless denim shirt and black sneakers. What is most noticeable however is that she has rouged her lips making them stand out "Mel's been in that dress all night."

"I guess I could use a shower" you admit. "So can someone tell me what happened last night?" You ask.

"You mean you don't remember." Ella says looking anxious.

"Not a thing past going into the club" An expression of relief crosses Ella's face.

"Well" Leah starts. "We go in, Hannah and I buy us all drinks and maybe the ones you were given were strong but sweet cocktails, you drink them..."

Ella interrupts "You dance, you fall and then I take you home and put you to bed."

Immediately you feel guilty for Ella having to leave early on the first night of welcome week just because you got drunk. "I'm really sorry I spoiled the night for you Ella" you say dolefully.

"It's fine Mel" She says reassuringly. "It wasn't just your fault, we know you haven't drunk before last nigh and Leah and Hannah's drink buying made it worse."

"And I'm paying for my crime now" Leah groans causing you and Ella to chuckle.

"Okay, so long as you aren't mad at me" you say.

"Nah it's fine Mel, it's college, these things are bound to happen."

The three of you settle and eat breakfast together, you and Ella blatantly make as much noise as possible with the cutlery much to Leah's displeasure but she takes it in her stride and after getting some food down her, her spirits have lifted a little and can actually appreciate the humour in your actions. As recompense, you wash up the dishes afterwards and tidy away. After you have finished, Ella puts an idea forward about how to spend the day.

"How about this. We could go to the huge park have a walk, maybe try out the swimming lake, it will be good for us all especially the bride of Dracula here" She gestures to Leah who plays along and hisses at Ella, burying herself in her shawl more. "And it is a really nice day." She has a point. From what you can tell from the windows, it is beautiful outside.

"I'm up for that." You say happily. "I'll need to get a shower first though and change into something for swimming. Are you coming Leah?" You turn to her.

"Even this hangover won't stop me from watching you swimming. Sure I'm coming." She says and you get the impression she winked at you behind her glasses. Again this succeeds in making you feel a little uncomfortable but your starting to learn that Leah jokes by flirting.

"Great" Ella says, lets all meet outside the house in say 45 minutes.

Ella and yourself head back to the room and you go to shower as Ella says she's already had one. Any feeling of grogginess you have is washed away by the warm waters and after drying and putting your club clothes in the laundry hamper, you get dressed finding Ella has already left the room.

Since you may be going swimming, you wear a pink bikini set as underwear and over the top you put on a salmon short t-shirt, short shorts and a pair of white lace detail ballet flats. You let your hair fall loose and give yourself a light dusting of make up before setting out.

Exiting the house you are greeted by cool fresh air and the lovely warmth of the sun. You find Ella stood in front smiling at you, http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DyNZ2cp4OPU/Vo...

"You look nice Mel" She says.

"Thanks, any sign of Leah?" You ask.

Ella just responds with a grin and points behind you towards the door. You whirl round and see Leah, still dressed in her gothic outfit over-dramatically hissing, recoiling at the sunlight and wrapping herself more and more in her shawl as she crosses the drive. You and Ella both burst out laughing.

"Well I'm glad my misery is good for something." She says as she reaches you both. "Are we ready because somewhere next to the lake is some quiet shade with my name on it."

At this, all three of you set off for the lake.
1451222111112.title: No

14512221111121.content:
The walk to the lake is calm and relaxing. The whole world around you is still and silent apart from the birds. Signs of the festivities the night previous are all over in the form of the occasional empty bottle, a lost high heel and even the odd pair of panties. As you pass from the residential area to the park, things start to liven up a bit. You pass people on the path, in the distance you can see a group of girls playing softball and you even see a few girls lay down on picnic blankets together soaking the sun. Ella snaps away with her camera leaving you and Leah to talk a little.

"Are you feeling any better yet?" You ask in a concerned voice after ten minutes of walking.

"Yeah, I've had it a lot worse" She says flippantly. "I'll be ready for tonight don't you worry."

Confused you ask. "Why whats happening tonight?"

"One of the other university clubs are running what they call a singles night, it is welcome week remember, they're running an event every night. Ella said she wanted to give it a miss and I'm assuming no one else wants to since Hannah is well.... busy and the rest of the girls are in a worse state than me. You should have seen Molly, she was a state. So how about you, do you want to come with me, be my date?" She chcuckles and reaches out and gently touches your bare arm which causes you to shiver and you nether regions to tingle.

"What's going on with me?" you think. "Umm yeah I'll let you know what we get back" you say.

"Great" Leah exclaims.

You are about to say that you only said maybe when Ella shouts. "Here we are" She says pointing to the great glistening expanse of blue green water which makes up the heart of the park. "Race you in Mel" She laughs running to the lake, quickly stripping down to her swimsuit as she goes.

In no mood to run you turn to Leah. "Are you swimming?"

"No I good watching plus someone has to look after the camera she just dropped" she points towards Ella's camera which is half buried underneath her discarded jeans.

"Alight see you in a bit."

You strip out of your shorts, top and take off you flats at the lake edge exposing your cute pink bikini to the world. You then proceed to enter the water slowly. The water is lovely and really warm again your skin and as it reaches your chest, you set off doing a lazy breaststroke. Ahead of you, you can see Ella doing the backstroke in her swim-shirt and baggy shorts but as she catches sight of you she immediately stops.

"Looking good Mel but oh no!" She exclaims dramatically. "Whats that behind you?" You wildly turn around half expecting to see the menacing dorsal fin of a great white approaching you only to find nothing. As you turn back to Ella you find her gone and the surface of the water where she was without a ripple.

"Ella?" you say cautiously. Another twenty seconds pass. "Ella" you call louder now getting quite worried. You swim over to the spot where she was a look down and see nothing. "El.....ahhhhh" You scream in sheer terror as suddenly from underneath you two hands grab you lifting you up and these hands are followed closely by a head. Ella's head and she's laughing "What the hell Ella, I thought you'd drowned?" you say when you calm down. Examining your position, you notice that she has you cradled in her arms still in the water.

"That was priceless Mel. You should have seen your face." She says after she stops laughing. "You thought lake monsters or something got me and then got you hahaha"

"Its not funny" you say pouting but starting to see the funny side of things "and are you going to put me down?"

"Not a chance, you now the rules now the monster has the damsel, it takes her to its lair."

"No wait" you squeak as while still clutching you, Ella goes back under water again. You clench your eyes shut as your head goes under but to your relief Ella almost immediately resurfaces.

As you surface you look Ella in the face and you both fall about laughing. After you finally both finish with you still resting in her arms, you look back to the shore to see Leah sat on the edge of the path leading into the water looking less than happy.
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3byhGdY_cnw/VS...

"Ah well, better let you go" Ella says releasing you. You tread water next to her. "So, what do you wanna do now?" she asks with a grin.
14512221111121.title: At the lake

145122211111211.content:
After about an hour and a half of frolicking in the water, you and Ella grow tired of playing monster and helpless maiden with you taking the part of helpless maiden, you both climb out of the water to find Leah and get dry. Still giggling, the pair of you find her lounging on a wooden pallet next to an old boathouse with your clothes next to her. She looks up from her dose looking peeved.

"You both enjoyed yourselves then?" She asks curtly.

"It was great, the water was warm and clear." Ella says and Leah scowls at her slightly.

"Yeah, we had fun, I wish you could have joined us though, it would have been more fun with all of us." You says picking up your top.

Leah brightens at this with a small smile appearing on her face. Ella on the other hand looks slightly downcast.

With it being such a nice day, you are almost completely dry just from the walk to the boathouse so you re-dress and lie down on a pallet next to Leah. Ella does the same and stretches out on another pallet next to you so that you are both in-between them both. With nothing else to do, you retrieve your ipod form your shorts' pocket, plug in and close your eyes. Slowly the sound of girly pop grows dimmer and dimmer as you drift off...

You rise suddenly, greeted again by brilliant if not waning sunlight. You are quickly reminded of your music and lean up to pull out the buds when you are met with a small flash and a click. Looking up you see Ella, fully dressed grinning down at you and again holding her camera.

"Oh come on Ella, why just when I wake up?" You groan.

Without saying a word Ella kneels down in front of you and displays the photo on her camera. http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QYsHVucgG54/VD...

You have to admit she has caught your good side and even with your makeup having been washed away in the water, you look cute.

Seemingly knowing what you're thinking, Ella speaks up. "You don't have to worry Mel, I don't think I could take a bad photo of you if I tried." This makes you blush a little. Ella stands after saving the photo.

"We better head back. We didn't want to wake you but it is getting kind of late. Lets get you up." Ella offers you her hand and you accept it and are lifted to your feet by the much taller girl.

"Where's Leah?" you ask noticing her absence.

"Here" Comes Leah's voice from behind you. Looking back you see her emerge from the abandoned boathouse. "Just exploring, we can head back now", she says as she gets closer.

When all back together, you set off back home. Straight away you can pick up that Leah seems a little off. Even when she had her hangover she was lively but now she appears slightly depressed. You don't call her out on it and but try to talk to her as much as possible on the way back. She seems to react positively to this but as soon as you and Ella start to recount the fun you had in the water her mood drops. You conclude that she feels left out but even behind her glasses you sense something, a longing when she looks at you and this in turn stirs something warm deep in you, just like when she touched you and when Ella picked you up in the water. "What does this mean" you think to yourself.

When you eventually reach home, it still doesn't appear as if anyone else is up. Ella then proceeds to excuse herself so that she can upload the photos on her camera to her laptop leaving just you and Leah. Just as you hear your room door open and close, Leah begins to talk.

"So quite a day huh" She says offering you a smile.

"We need to do it more often" You say. "Maybe even get you in your swimsuit."

Leah grins at this and raises her eyebrow. "That can be arranged" she says sultrily "Anyway, the party tonight will make your swim seem like nothing in comparison. You are going to come with me right?" She looks at you expectantly.

You do really want to make the most of welcome week but if you get drunk again tonight (which you're sure will if you go), you may not be as lucky as this morning and spoil the rest of the week just on a night with you and Leah without the rest of the house. On the other hand Leah has been left out all day and you really want to make it up to her and even get to know her better. "Maybe a little more than that" you think before quickly brushing that thought aside. Either way, a decision has to be made.
145122211111211.title: Later.
